attributes.action: support families who are trying to get themselves in a situation where they can financially support themselves
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
-Lower benefits for people who neither work nor study.  
-Add an element to the Tax Credits System that supports parents who are studying in order for them to get the qualifications to raise their potential earnings. 
-Introduce tax relief for mortgage payers who if they rented would b entitled to housing benefit for rent payments. 

And therefore support the families who are making the effort to support themselves instead of the families who make no effort to support themselves.
